name: OPPOSITES (adhochero)
description:
VR Super Jam- 3 day -Entry, opposites
VR endless runner obstacle course.
as you play you will change color (visible by hands and notification), you must stay on the opposite path as your color. if you touch the same color as yourself you will loose health and die. 
you must be quick and outrun the checkered barrier, if it catches you you will die. You must be careful, if you fall you will die also. 

SETTINGS: 

When in game if you press the menu button on left controller is will pause and let you change the settings press again to resume.

controls:
thumbstick to run
'A' button to jump
hand triggers to grab things to climb

credit:
game was made and programmed by me.

song was made and provide by headspace canary https://soundcloud.com/headspace_canary

other sound effects from free sounds.org
